title: Post List
description: A list of blog post metadata objects.

id.title: ID
id.description: The 8-character hex string ID of the post.

slug.title: Slug
slug.description: The slug string used in the URL.

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: A summary paragraph describing the post.

createdAt.title: Created At
createdAt.description: The ISO-8601 timestamp when the post was created.

modifiedAt.title: Modified At
modifiedAt.description: The ISO-8601 timestamp when the post was last modified.
